Package com.phasmidsoftware.dsaipg.sort.helper

package com.phasmidsoftware.dsaipg.sort.helper
  • Class
    Description
    BaseComparableHelper<X extends Comparable<X>>
    A base class that provides helper functionality for objects that implement the Comparable interface.
    BaseComparatorHelper<X>
    Abstract class that extends from BaseHelper and implements NonComparableHelper to provide additional functionality for handling comparisons of elements of type X using a specified Comparator.
    BaseHelper<X>
    The BaseHelper abstract class provides utility methods and configuration options for managing and instrumenting operations related to a collection of elements of type X.
    ComparableHelper<X extends Comparable<X>>
    Helper interface which extends NonComparableHelper.
    GenericSortWithHelper<X>
    Abstract class GenericSortWithHelper which extends Sort.
    Helper<X>
    Interface to define all the helper methods (and which does not require the underlying type to be Comparable).
    HelperException
    HelperException is a custom exception class that extends RuntimeException.
    HelperFactory
    Class HelperFactory.
    Instrument
    Interface to define the operations of instrumentation.
    InstrumentedComparableHelper<X extends Comparable<X>>
    Helper class for sorting methods with instrumentation of compares and swaps, and in addition, bounds checks.
    InstrumentedComparatorHelper<X>
    Helper class for sorting methods with instrumentation of compares and swaps, and in addition, bounds checks.
    Instrumenter
    The Instrumenter class implements the Instrument interface and is used to record and analyze specific metrics during the execution of algorithms, such as the number of copies, swaps, comparisons, fixes, hits, and lookups.
    InstrumenterDummy
    A dummy implementation of the Instrument interface, primarily used for testing or as a placeholder when no instrumentation is needed.
    NonComparableHelper<X>
    Basic Helper interface for non-comparable X types.
    NonInstrumentingComparableHelper<X extends Comparable<X>>
    A helper class extending BaseComparableHelper to assist with sorting and comparisons without instrumentation.
    NonInstrumentingComparableHelper.HelperException
    A custom runtime exception used within the context of helper-related operations.
